args:
USE [{{Database}}]
GO

IF  EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[{{Stored Procedure Name}}]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC'))
DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[{{Stored Procedure Name}}]
GO

USE [{{Database}}]
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[{{Stored Procedure Name}}]
@VARS
AS
BEGIN

$1

END
GO

GRANT EXECUTE ON [dbo].[{{Stored Procedure Name}}] TO [DBRole_GISWEBUsers] AS [dbo]
GO
